overview: Jacinto is killed by National Security. Eleuterio, his son, grows up without a father, later working as an employee of the Port of La Guaira. There he gets involved in merchandise trafficking, forced by his own financial constraints and that of a relative. The port is investigated and Eleuterio is handed over as a "scapegoat", falling into an ambush that costs him his life.
title: Pirañas de Puerto
